title: Nutrition Roundup: Muscle Repair and Plant-based Hydration from Gnarly, Mantra, GU and Tailwind
content:
Whether you’re fueling up for a winter on the indoor trainer, or summer of hot laps at the Bike Park, you’ll be in need of easily digestible calories and electrolytes to keep you riding to your potential. This week, we round up some of the latest sports nutrition to hit the market, from a drink

The post Nutrition Roundup: Muscle Repair and Plant-based Hydration from Gnarly, Mantra, GU and Tailwind appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
